text:
There is some serious mixed messaging about question #2 on the #CARecall ballot. 
Some people are saying to choose an alternate Dem candidate, but it looks like most people/orgs (including Newsom & ⬇️) are saying to leave it blank? 
But don’t we need a safety net? SO CONFUSING🙆🏼‍♀️ https://t.co/KEbH1lK1FN
